sd4u.html

Class HTMLMerger

  • java.lang.Object
    • sd4u.html.HTMLMerger

  • public class HTMLMerger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class merges all editable containers and blocks which are fixed by HTML code.
    Author:
    H. Cetiner & Y.H. Kalayci

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HTMLMerger(java.lang.String title, java.lang.String page)
      This methods provides merging process begin.
      HTMLMerger(java.net.URL titleUrl, java.net.URL pageUrl)
      This methods converts Page's and Title's HTML codes to String, and provides merging process begin.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getFullHTML()
      This method returns merged HTML code (with relative .css and .js paths).
      java.lang.String getFullHTMLForEditor() 
      void readFixedParts()
      This method reads fixed parts' HTML codes and converts them to String.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • HTMLMerger

        public HTMLMerger(java.net.URL titleUrl,
                  java.net.URL pageUrl)
        This methods converts Page's and Title's HTML codes to String, and provides merging process begin.
        Parameters:

        public HTMLMerger(java.lang.String title,
                  java.lang.String page)
        This methods provides merging process begin.
        Parameters:
        title - URL of title's HTMLcode as String.
        page - URL of page's HTMLcode as String.
